Hi,

Hey Glen,

The wording is still wrong.

On the homepage you have correct wording of: Price excluding new government levy of of $45.10*

On the actual service page you have: Government levy of $45.10 inclusive*

Can you please amend it so that its uniform (same as homepage text)...

Please check over work prior to sending confirmation as to avoid the back and forth moving forward.
All good—I've moved the levy wording to the top as requested. Please refresh the site to see the update.
Sorry, All good regarding the price, just move the levy wording up top

Let me know if there's anything else you'd like adjusted.

Hi Glen,

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

I need the following changed:

1) The pricing on home page and individual pages show that a government levy is included within the stated price. The wording needs to change to the following:
Price excluding new government levy of xxxx*

2) We then need to move the mention of the government levy from the bottom to the top in brackets, either place the wording next to the price or right underneath. Please ensure that this is done for all pages including the home page and each individual service pages where price is mentioned.

I have attached a screenshot below illustrating what is essentially needed.

Please confirm once these 2 changes have been made.

Cheers,
Kosta



--
Kosta Galanis
Performance Lead
T: (02) 9171 4990 | M: 0452 504 090
